text.text:
Enjoyed my stay.
What a tranquil spot in the heart of the city.
Very green, relaxing and excellent service. The staff is very intuitive and gauge your needs before you state it.
Was very surprised when they placed a yoga mat in my room when they saw I moved the carpet to the balcony. What a delight!!  The breakfast had several interesting unconventional options. Saurabh at the reception was very prompt and professional much like the rest of the staff.

text.text:
From the moment you step in, you’re greeted with warm hospitality and impeccable service. The lush greenery and beautifully landscaped gardens make it feel like a peaceful resort in the middle of the city. Rooms are elegant, spacious, and well-appointed with every detail thoughtfully taken care of.

The food across all the restaurants is excellent – especially the breakfast spread, which is both diverse and delicious. The staff go out of their way to make your stay comfortable and memorable.

Perfect for business and leisure alike. Highly recommended if you’re looking for a luxurious and serene escape in Bangalore.

text.text:
Staying at The Oberoi, Bangalore was truly the best experience of my life. From the moment I arrived, I was treated with such warmth and care—it felt like home, only more luxurious. Every single staff member was incredibly sweet, attentive, and genuinely caring, going out of their way to make sure every little detail was perfect.

The property is stunning, the rooms are serene, and the service is unmatched. It's not just a stay; it's an experience you’ll carry with you long after you leave.

If you’re looking for unforgettable hospitality, this is it.

text.text:
Until I was in the hotel, I never got a feeling that I was in a city or in Bangalore. It felt like I am somewhere far away from city amidst those trees with rain throughout the day.
Room service was extraordinary. Food was very good. Breakfast buffet had limited options but we could always order if anything is needed. We couldn't have breakfast early in the morning so got it packed to room at no extra cost.
They say pool water is temperature controlled but in actual it was not. Spa, gym and pool facilities are available. Spa is way too costly. Gym was well maintained. Pool was well maintained too. It was really pleasant to stay there. But they could have had indoor games, as we can't step out during rains and when pool is too chill.
24hrs hot water facility is available. Evenings and mornings in balcony were just awesome.

editorialSummary.text: Contemporary hotel featuring 2 restaurants, a gym & a pool, plus a bar with live music.

text.text:
Dearest Hilton Bangalore,

I just wanted to express my sincere gratitude for your incredible hospitality. I was so touched when I wasn't feeling well, and your staff, Tanu, Susmita, Aati, Diya, Anuj, Harshit, Sandeep, Shivam, Ankit, Sikha, and Devendra, went above and beyond to care for me. They even got me dal khichdi, making me feel like I was being cared for by family away from home. The breakfast, lunch, and dinner were absolutely delicious, and the hot toddy was exactly what I needed. That special note was the sweetest touch!

It truly felt like being cared for by an extended family. Thank you for creating such a warm and welcoming environment. You've made a lasting impression, and I can't wait to visit again!

Warmly,
Karishma Lilwani

editorialSummary.text: Colonial-style hotel offering plush rooms & suites, plus 2 restaurants, a chic bar & a rooftop pool.

text.text:
🌟 Review for RG Royal Hotel 🌟
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (Easily 5 stars—and if I could give more, I would!)

I recently stayed at RG Royal Hotel, and I must say—it was an absolutely wonderful experience from start to finish.

To begin with, the location is spot-on—well connected and convenient for getting around. As for the suite I booked, it was very spacious, clean, and incredibly comfortable. The beds were plush and cozy—perfect for a good night’s rest after a long day. The bathroom was pristine, and the toiletries provided were top-notch—no cutting corners here!

What truly stood out, though, was the ambience—elegant yet relaxed, giving us the right mix of comfort and class. Whether I was hanging out with friends or just soaking in the vibe, it felt just right.

Now let’s talk about the food—oh wow! It was super, super good. Every meal was delicious and clearly made with care and quality ingredients. From breakfast to dinner, the dining experience was a delight.

In short: clean rooms, comfy beds, excellent amenities, delicious food, and great vibes. What more can you ask for?

I had a fantastic time here with friends, and I would strongly recommend RG Royal Hotel to anyone visiting the area. Will definitely return! ✅

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Liverpool , and I must say, it was one of the best experiences I’ve ever had at a hotel. From the moment I arrived, the staff made me feel welcomed with warm smiles and genuine hospitality. The check-in process was smooth and efficient, and I was even offered a welcome drink, which was a thoughtful touch after a long journey.

The room exceeded my expectations in every way. It was not only spotlessly clean but also elegantly furnished, with modern amenities and a cozy ambiance that immediately made me feel at home. The bed was incredibly comfortable with fresh, crisp linens, ensuring a restful night’s sleep. I particularly loved the attention to detail – from the complimentary toiletries to the neatly arranged tea and coffee station. The view from my window was breathtaking, offering a perfect backdrop to wake up to every morning.

One of the highlights of my stay was the food. The breakfast buffet had a wide range of options, catering to both local flavors and international tastes. Everything was fresh, well-prepared, and delicious. I especially appreciated the live counter where dishes were made to order – the chefs truly knew how to impress. Dining at their in-house restaurant for dinner was equally wonderful, with attentive staff and a menu that balanced creativity with traditional favorites.

What truly set this hotel apart, however, was the service. Every member of the team went above and beyond to ensure I was comfortable and had everything I needed. Whether it was the front desk assisting me with travel tips, housekeeping ensuring my room was always in pristine condition, or the restaurant staff remembering my preferences, the level of care and professionalism was remarkable.

The facilities were another plus. The pool area was well-maintained, perfect for a relaxing swim, and the spa services were rejuvenating – definitely worth trying. The hotel also had excellent Wi-Fi, spacious lounges to relax or work in, and convenient transportation arrangements, which made exploring the city effortless.

Overall, my stay at Liverpool was nothing short of perfect. It combined luxury, comfort, and heartfelt service in a way that left a lasting impression. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone – whether traveling for leisure or business – as it truly understands what great hospitality means. I look forward to returning on my next visit!

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting The Leela Bhartiya City, and I must say — it felt like stepping into a city within a city. The experience was nothing short of extraordinary.

From the moment you enter, you're surrounded by lush greenery and thoughtfully designed pathways that make every walk feel refreshing and calming. The entire property is beautifully integrated into Bhartiya City, which itself is a vibrant urban ecosystem. It’s not just a hotel — it’s an experience. With a school, corporate offices, a serene park, a mall, a cinema theatre, and so much more within walking distance, it truly feels self-contained yet seamlessly connected.

The hotel itself stands tall with its signature Leela elegance — luxurious interiors, warm hospitality, and a peaceful ambiance that makes you want to stay longer. Whether you're here for business, leisure, or just a quick getaway, the surroundings and amenities make it the perfect destination.

If you’re looking for a place that combines luxury, convenience, and an escape into nature — The Leela Bhartiya City is a place you must visit.

text.text:
Exceptional Food, But Reservations Need Work

I recently dined at The Leela Bhartiya City and was thoroughly impressed with the culinary experience. The food was absolutely top-notch — each dish beautifully presented, flavorful, Whether it was the rich Indian delicacies, the globally-inspired dishes, or the decadent desserts, everything surpassed expectations. The ambiance is elegant yet inviting, and the service (once seated) was warm and attentive.

However, I do feel compelled to highlight one recurring issue: reservations. Despite booking in advance, our table wasn’t ready on arrival, and we had to wait significantly past our reservation time. For a hotel of this caliber, better reservation management would go a long way in improving the overall guest experience.

That said, the food more than made up for the initial hiccup. I’d still recommend dining here, especially if you’re looking for a special culinary outing — just be prepared for a potential wait, even with a reservation.

Beyond disappointed — and I will make sure as many people as possible know exactly how shockingly low their standards are!!!

text.text:
Came for a conference. Didn't stay at the property, and honestly, wouldn't like to.

Yes, the organisers of the event Didn't plan the event nicely. But the hotel team Didn't as well.

In the menu, one of the dishes were veg Manchurian, when they had to refill, probably they were out of Manchurian and in the gravy they had put dahi ke kebab. I mean like seriously? Who does that? I mean a dhabha also wouldn't do this. What if someone is lactose intolerant and has that? Anyway, that's not even the point.. the point is at a 5 star hotel.. food shortage happened (which is okay) but you can't serve anything and think that the guests are fool, they won't realise.

And I am like 1000% sure they were dahi ke kebab as I am a chef turned into a food safety auditor.

The plates and spoons- super dirty. Food marks present, water marks still there. Not washed properly,  and not even tried to wipe. Cutlery had smell.

I also couldn't find any bins in the public areas.. i mean that's weird, probably some policy or something.

The smoking zone in the restaurant-- idk how often it is cleaned and the buds are trashed out. I mean i like went 4-5 times.. and it was same.

Only good thing - the public areas washroom (that too only lobby) was well maintained.
The washroom at the conference floor (2) - no one bothered to check the cleanliness or the toilet roll replenishment.

Also - the uniform if the service team during the meals... it Didn't feel like i was attending a conference at a 5 star hotel that too sheraton.

Appreciation only for the security team. Very hospitable.

text.text:
I stayed at Hotel Maurya for two nights during a recent business trip to Bangalore. The biggest plus is definitely the location—it’s just a short walk from Majestic Bus Stand and Bangalore City Railway Station, which makes commuting super easy.

The check-in process was smooth, and the staff were polite and professional. I booked a Deluxe Room, which was spacious and fairly clean. The bed was comfortable, and they provided fresh towels and basic toiletries. The Wi-Fi connection was average—not the fastest, but enough for emails and browsing.

Their in-house restaurant, Tamara, serves a decent buffet breakfast with both South Indian and continental options. I also tried dinner once—tasty and reasonably priced. There’s also a bar (RHUM) on the property, which seemed popular in the evening.

However, the hotel does feel a bit dated. Some areas like the bathroom fittings and corridor carpets could really use a refresh. Also, the AC took a while to cool, and the TV remote didn’t work properly. Minor issues, but noticeable.

The surrounding area (Majestic) is very crowded and noisy, especially during peak hours. It’s safe, but I wouldn't recommend walking alone late at night if you're not familiar with Bangalore.

text.text:
Please avoid booking this hotel. With family and single also
On 26th June 2025, at around 3:11 AM, some people repeatedly rang the doorbell and knocked aggressively on our room door, as if they were trying to break in. A similar incident occurred again at around 7:00 AM. Because of this, our sleep was completely disturbed, and we felt extremely unsafe.
After 10:00 AM, I informed Mr. Purshottam at the reception about what happened. He said that the manager, Mr. Ramesh, would speak with those involved. However, there was no proper follow-up or accountability.
This kind of behavior is extremely unprofessional, and it’s clear that there is no proper security or guest safety at this hotel. It is definitely not suitable for families, and I strongly advise against staying here..

The hotel's location on Old Airport Road is a significant advantage, offering easy access to key areas like Indiranagar, Koramangala, and MG Road.  It's also conveniently right next to Manipal Hospital, making it a suitable choice for those visiting the hospital.

The rooms are spacious, clean, and well-maintained, providing a comfortable stay.  The staff is courteous and attentive, ensuring that guests feel welcomed and taken care of.  The breakfast buffet offers a variety of options, including continental dishes, and the quality of food is commendable.

The interiors and decor feel a bit dated, and the lighting in certain areas, like corridors, can be dim.  Additionally, the pricing for food and beverages is on the higher side, which might not align with everyone's expectations.

Some reviews mention the food can be pricey.

Exquisite Luxury and Impeccable Service: A Heavenly Experience at The Oberoi, Bangalore

Rating: ★★★★★

The Oberoi, Bangalore is an exceptional haven of opulence, where luxury seamlessly intertwines with warm hospitality. My recent stay at this magnificent hotel left an indelible impression, and I am thrilled to share my appreciation for its unmatched service, breathtaking ambiance, and unrivaled attention to detail.

Upon entering the grand lobby, I was immediately captivated by the hotel's timeless elegance. The tasteful interior design, featuring a perfect blend of contemporary aesthetics and traditional Indian motifs, exudes a sense of refined sophistication. The Oberoi, Bangalore undoubtedly sets the stage for a truly unforgettable experience.

The rooms at The Oberoi, Bangalore redefine luxury living. From the moment I stepped into my suite, I was enveloped in a world of comfort and tranquility. The meticulous attention given to every detail, from the plush bedding to the captivating city views, spoke volumes about the hotel's commitment to excellence. The spaciousness of the room allowed me to unwind in absolute serenity, making it an ideal retreat after a long day of exploration.

What truly sets The Oberoi, Bangalore apart is its remarkable service. The staff's unwavering dedication to ensuring guest satisfaction is second to none. Every encounter was characterized by warmth, attentiveness, and a genuine desire to create a memorable experience. From the friendly concierge who offered invaluable suggestions for local attractions to the diligent housekeeping staff who kept my room immaculate, the team at The Oberoi, Bangalore exceeded my expectations in every way.

Dining at The Oberoi, Bangalore is an absolute delight for the senses. The hotel boasts a range of exceptional restaurants, each offering a distinctive culinary experience. Whether savoring Indian delicacies at the award-winning "Rim Naam" or indulging in global flavors at "Le Jardin," the culinary expertise on display was simply phenomenal. The exquisite presentation, impeccable service, and the use of the finest ingredients showcased the hotel's commitment to culinary excellence.

The Oberoi, Bangalore also houses a state-of-the-art spa and fitness center, where I had the opportunity to rejuvenate both body and mind. The spa's serene ambiance, coupled with a wide array of rejuvenating treatments, left me feeling utterly refreshed and pampered. The fitness center, equipped with top-of-the-line equipment, provided a perfect opportunity to maintain my wellness routine while enjoying the luxurious surroundings.

Situated in the heart of Bangalore, The Oberoi's location is ideal for both business and leisure travelers. Its proximity to prominent landmarks and commercial districts ensures easy accessibility, while the hotel's serene environment shields guests from the city's hustle and bustle.

In conclusion, The Oberoi, Bangalore is a true gem that offers an unforgettable luxury experience. Its impeccable service, breathtaking ambiance, and unwavering commitment to guest satisfaction set it apart from the rest. I wholeheartedly recommend this remarkable hotel to anyone seeking an indulgent retreat in the vibrant city of Bangalore.

text.text:
At first the hotel may seem a little aged but after a while you really think of it as an elegant patina. However for me the standout was the old school service. Every interaction mattered, from the greeting that every person gives, to how the wait staff clears your plates efficiently during meal service, to the individual good byes from the staff, there is a real professionalism and pride here at this hotel.

Even the fact that they organised and arranged my cables cleanly and then provided a screen cleaner, this level of dedication is so encouraging because to me it’s lost in so many of the hotel chains. Yes it may not be as large or as grand or as new as some other places but it was lovely hotel and I had a memorable stay.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Hilton, I stayed here for my birthday celebration and I must say, it was an absolutely fantastic experience from start to finish. This 5-star gem exceeded all my expectations, offering a level of luxury and service that left a lasting impression.
The room was nothing short of a sanctuary. Impeccably designed, with attention to every detail, it felt like a home away from home. The plush bedding, tasteful decor, and breathtaking greenery golf view from the window created an ambiance of pure indulgence.
The staff at Hilton truly understands the meaning of hospitality. From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with warmth and professionalism. The receptionist was knowledgeable and always ready to assist, making recommendations for local attractions and ensuring all my needs were met promptly.

Dining at the hotel was a culinary delight. The on-site restaurants boasted an impressive array of dishes, each a masterpiece in its own right. The breakfast buffet was a highlight and the live counters were amazing offering a wide selection of fresh, high-quality options to suit every palate.

The hotel spared no expense in providing top-notch amenities. The  fitness center featured state-of-the-art equipment. The attention to detail in maintaining cleanliness and order throughout the facilities was evident.

In conclusion, Hilton has set the bar exceptionally high for what a 5-star hotel experience should be. The combination of luxurious accommodations, impeccable service, and attention to detail made my stay truly unforgettable. I look forward to returning and highly recommend Hilton to anyone seeking a refined and indulgent retreat.

text.text:
🌟 Review for RG Royal Hotel 🌟
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (Easily 5 stars—and if I could give more, I would!)

I recently stayed at RG Royal Hotel, and I must say—it was an absolutely wonderful experience from start to finish.

To begin with, the location is spot-on—well connected and convenient for getting around. As for the suite I booked, it was very spacious, clean, and incredibly comfortable. The beds were plush and cozy—perfect for a good night’s rest after a long day. The bathroom was pristine, and the toiletries provided were top-notch—no cutting corners here!

What truly stood out, though, was the ambience—elegant yet relaxed, giving us the right mix of comfort and class. Whether I was hanging out with friends or just soaking in the vibe, it felt just right.

Now let’s talk about the food—oh wow! It was super, super good. Every meal was delicious and clearly made with care and quality ingredients. From breakfast to dinner, the dining experience was a delight.

In short: clean rooms, comfy beds, excellent amenities, delicious food, and great vibes. What more can you ask for?

I had a fantastic time here with friends, and I would strongly recommend RG Royal Hotel to anyone visiting the area. Will definitely return! ✅

text.text:
Staying at Holiday Inn Bengaluru Racecourse for eight nights was an absolute delight. We checked in after midnight and the front desk staff was very friendly and fast and as diamond elite members we were given an upgrade to a room on the 15th floor with turf view and balcony. The room itself was not too spacious, but had everything we needed, including a super comfy bed, a sofa chair and desk area. There was a fruit platter and chocolates as welcome gifts and we were helped with our luggage. The turf view and the balcony were magnificent. We enjoyed watching the horses.

Cleanliness and attention to detail were top priorities throughout our stay. The housekeeping staff always greeted us in the hall and asked if everything was to our satisfaction. On several days, they even left handwritten thank you notes and a folded towel elephant and towel shirt with a rose, which we had never received anywhere else before.

Breakfast consisted of a varied buffet of Indian and western food choices, which especially made us brighten our horizons on Indian cuisine. Each and every one of the staff was more than attentive, offering coffee and chai, immediately refilling the food stations and even serving us dishes from a live cooking station to our table. On our last day, Hirak, one of the breakfast staff members approached us to say thanks, knowingly of the end of our stay. He, Suvankar, Dipti and Pushpa come to mind, always welcoming us warm-heartedly, and making our day start with a smile.

We had dinner at the Glass kitchen and bar twice during our stay. This restaurant serves modern Indian cuisine. Both times there, we were treated very welcoming and also received recommendations on what to order. Outstanding service and delicious food!

For a quick snack and perhaps a beer, we can also recommend the bar on the ground level, having been there three times ourselves.

Being our first time to India, we took advantage of the concierge services offered and booked various driving tours through Bengaluru as well as a one day tour to Mysore with Chandra. He took us to the most amazing temples and even went with us inside as we would have never dared just walk in. Chandra took videos and photos of us and offered information on various places. We could not have imagined a better and more respectful person to drive and guide us around.

The rooftop pool with turf view was a great place to have a quick swim. As the water temperature was rather cold, it was perfect to go in there before breakfast. The predator birds circling above were interesting to watch, and the view was amazing.

Unfortunately, we never made it to the fitness room, except for one quick glance. The attendent there was very inviting and showed us around.

Security staff in front of the hotel was always very friendly and professional, no matter what time of day it was.

All in all, it was a perfect stay, and we can fully and truly recommend Holiday Inn Bengaluru Racecourse.

The room seemed well-maintained and hygienic. The view was so serene with a wide view of the turf and seeing the horses being trained in the mornings makes you feel calm. Moreover, the hospitality of the staff and the complimentary breakfast were over the mark too. The check-in/check-out was also handled smoothly. Would really recommend staying here!

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at a hotel during my trip to Bengaluru. Overall, my experience was highly satisfying, thanks to the friendly and efficient staff, particularly Hafiz, who went above and beyond to ensure a smooth check-in process.

Upon arrival late at night, I was warmly welcomed by Hafiz at the reception desk. His professionalism and attentiveness immediately put me at ease after a long journey. He efficiently handled the check-in procedure, providing all the necessary information about the hotel amenities and services.

One aspect that impressed me throughout my stay was the hotel's cleanliness. The housekeeping staff deserves praise for maintaining a spotless and hygienic environment. The rooms were tidied up every day, and the beds were exceptionally comfortable, ensuring a good night's sleep.

One of the most appealing aspects of this hotel is its affordability. Despite offering excellent service and a clean atmosphere, the price was reasonable and provided good value for money. It was refreshing to find a hotel that offered such quality without breaking the bank.

Speaking of atmosphere, the hotel managed to create a healthy and peaceful ambiance. The interior was tastefully designed, providing a serene and relaxing environment. This allowed me to unwind and enjoy my stay to the fullest.

Additionally, the hotel's location was convenient as it was situated close to several good restaurants. Exploring the nearby dining options was a delight, and I had no trouble finding a variety of cuisines to suit my preferences. The hotel's staff was also helpful in recommending some fantastic dining experiences in the area.

In conclusion, my stay at this hotel was a positive experience from start to finish. The reception, led by Hafiz, was outstanding, the check-in process was efficient even late at night. The hotel offered a clean and comfortable environment, and the affordable price made it all the more appealing. I thoroughly enjoyed my time here, and I would highly recommend this hotel to fellow travelers looking for a pleasant and hassle-free stay.

Vibe is at Ibis!
This was THE most fulfilling hotel experience of my life so far : such courteous and efficient staff, compact and clean room with a lovely view, and amazing food and drinks, it ticks all the right boxes. The clean, youthful vibe is refreshing, and their focus on sustainability with reduced plastic and more glass usage is commendable.
The management should take a bow for assembling such a perfect team of youngsters who will definitely take this property to new heights. I must mention the impeccable services of Soham, Indeesh, Durga, Neha and Varun.
Mr. Nantu is a genius at the bar with Shiv and Manvith, and the Live Kitchen is a delight to watch with Chef Saurav and his team with Jaspal, Vasundhara, Suleman and their colleagues!
Thank you again Ibis, I'll be back for sure!

Mr. Nantu is a genius at the bar with Shiv and Manvith, and the Live Kitchen is a delight to watch with Chef Saurav and his team with Jaspal, Vasundhara, Suleman and their colleagues!
Thank you again Ibis, I'll be back for sure!

text.text:
Great Birthday Party Experience

I recently celebrated my daughter's birthday party at Hotel Mac Sterling on 08-Apr, and it was a fantastic experience. The food was absolutely delicious, and the ambience was excellent, providing a perfect backdrop for the celebrations. However, what made the experience truly exceptional was the impeccable hospitality and professionalism of the staff, especially Mr Singh, Mr Rahul, and Mr Amit.

They were incredibly attentive to all our needs and ensured that everything ran smoothly throughout the evening. Their friendly and welcoming demeanor made us feel right at home, and they went above and beyond to make the event truly memorable.

I highly recommend Hotel Mac Sterling for any special occasion, as the combination of great food, excellent ambience, and outstanding staff hospitality and professionalism makes it an unbeatable choice. Thank you to all staff who stood by for making our birthday party an unforgettable experience!

text.text:
My stay was truly delightful, particularly due to the exceptional service and comfortable amenities.

Staff: The staff went above and beyond to be helpful and assist with all my needs. A special shout-out to Yogi, who was incredibly prompt and efficient in helping me with a room change request. Their responsiveness truly made a difference.

Room: The King's Deluxe room was remarkably spacious, offering ample room to relax. I especially appreciated the thoughtful touch of having multiple pillow options for personalized comfort. The room was immaculately clean, neat, and tidy, and I was particularly pleased by a subtle, very pleasing fragrance that permeated the space, adding to the overall welcoming ambiance.

Food: While taste is subjective, I must say the food here was a standout experience. It was, without a doubt, the best I've encountered at any 5-star hotel. The culinary team truly excels, preparing dishes with exquisite flavors without relying on unnecessary spices, allowing the natural ingredients to shine. For in-room dining, while my calls didn't connect on the first attempt both times, the food arrived remarkably quickly, within about 20 minutes, which was impressive.
